plot: Chemical elements had disappeared from the planet, causing forests, buildings and life itself to disappear. Research reveals that the elements have been flowing into another Earth on the another side of a dimensional wall that can only be accessed by those with flexible minds. A team of Element Hunters is formed to return the elements to Earth.
ending_theme: "Suihei Liebe - Mahō no Jumon" by Kakki & Ash Potato
"スイヘイリーベ～魔法の呪文～" by かっきー＆アッシュポテト
